am_reg_macros.h File Reference

Helper macros for using hardware registers. More...

Detailed Description

Helper macros for using hardware registers.

Go to the source code of this file.

Macros

#define AM_REGVAL_FLOAT(x)   (*((volatile float *)(x)))
 
#define AM_REGADDR(periph, reg)   ( periph##_BASE + offsetof(periph##_Type, reg) )

◆ AM_REGADDRn

#define AM_REGADDRn ( periph,
n,
reg )
Value:
( periph##0_BASE + \
offsetof(periph##0_Type, reg) + \
(n * (periph##1_BASE - periph##0_BASE)) )

◆ DIFF_OVF_CAP

#define DIFF_OVF_CAP ( diff,
boost,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
diff = \
( (module->reg##_b.field + boost) > ((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos)) ? \
(((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos)) - module->reg##_b.field) : boost );

◆ DIFF_OVF_CAP_BASE

#define DIFF_OVF_CAP_BASE ( diff,
base,
boost,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
diff = \
( (base + boost) > ((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos)) ? \
(((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos)) - base) : boost )

◆ DIFF_UDF_CAP

#define DIFF_UDF_CAP ( diff,
reduce,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
diff = \
( (module->reg##_b.field > reduce) ? \
reduce : module->reg##_b.field );

◆ DIFF_UDF_CAP_BASE

#define DIFF_UDF_CAP_BASE ( diff,
base,
reduce )
Value:
diff = \
( (base > reduce) ? \
reduce : base )

◆ FINAL_VAL_OVF_CAP

#define FINAL_VAL_OVF_CAP ( boost,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
module->reg##_b.field = \
( (module->reg##_b.field + boost) > ((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos)) ? \
(((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos))) : (module->reg##_b.field + boost) );

◆ FINAL_VAL_OVF_CAP_BASE

#define FINAL_VAL_OVF_CAP_BASE ( base,
boost,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
module->reg##_b.field = \
( (base + boost) > ((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos)) ? \
(((module##_##reg##_##field##_Msk) >> (module##_##reg##_##field##_Pos))) : (base + boost) )

◆ FINAL_VAL_UDF_CAP

#define FINAL_VAL_UDF_CAP ( reduce,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
module->reg##_b.field = \
( (module->reg##_b.field > reduce) ? \
(module->reg##_b.field - reduce) : 0 );

◆ FINAL_VAL_UDF_CAP_BASE

#define FINAL_VAL_UDF_CAP_BASE ( base,
reduce,
module,
reg,
field )
Value:
module->reg##_b.field = \
( (base > reduce) ? \
(base - reduce) : 0 )
